desc: The next attack deals an additional hit and <$ba.stun>stuns</> for {duration} seconds. Additionally, increase splash area and aftershock damage

Attack Interval<@ba.talpu>Reduced</> ATK+ {ATK%}, attack {multiple} enemies simultaneously
<$ba.charged>Charged</> effect: Attack changes to multiple continuous attacks,each attack deal {ATK%} damage as Physical damage and attack random enemies in Attack Range</br><@ba.rem>(Can manually deactivate skill)</>

Immediately summons 2 Spirit's Shadows within Attack Range (can use Art attacks, up to 3 can exist at the same time, remains after the skill ends). ATK+{ATK%}, Attack Interval <@ba.vup>massively increase</>. Attack deal {damage%} as Physical damage. Greatly increase splash area and increase Talent 1 activation rate to <@ba.vup>100%</> 
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {bullet} bullets and the skill ends when all bullets are used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>

Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK+ {ATK}. Enemies within Attack Range with HP lower than {ATK%} of Logos' ATK immediately defeat, and deals Arts damage equal to the defeated enemy's HP to a random target within Attack Range
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>

RES+{RES}. Attack change to lock-on target and continue dealing Art damage to them. Attacks against the same target gradually increase in damage up to {damage} and gradually reduce their Movement Speed up to {mspd} (reaches the limit in {rampup} seconds after lock-on). When interrupted or the target is defeated, lock-on to a new target and reset the effects
Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK+ {ATK}, attacks {cnt} enemies simultaneously. Enemy projectiles within Attack Range have massively reduced speed and disappear when the skill ends

Trait effect increased by <@ba.vup>{trait_up}</> and reduce "Fine Dust"'s respawn time reduced
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>

Increase the maximum number of "Fine Dust" by/to {max.cnt} and immediately gain {gain.cnt} "Fine Dust". Increase the rotation radius of "Fine Dust". All allies within Attack Range gain <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</> equal to {%ATK} of this unit's ATK. "Fine Dust" no longer hits allies, instead it deals {%ATK} ATK as True Damage when hitting enemies and <$ba.root>Binds</> them for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds.

Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, Trait effect increased by <@ba.vup>{trait_up}</>, "Fine Dust" no longer disappears. All allies within Attack Range gain <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</> equal to {%MAXHP} of this unit's Max HP. Periodically redistribute the HP of all allies within Attack Range
ASPD+{ASPD} . Attacks heal all allies within Attack Range for {ATK%} of Amiya's ATK

Immediately deal {%ATK} ATK as Art damage to all enemies within Attack Range and inflict Attack Speed -{ASPD} and Movement Speed -{MSPD} for {duration} seconds; 
For every enemy hit by this attack, ATK+{ATK%} (up to {stack.ATK%}). Afterwards, Amiya will deal <@ba.vup>True damage</> and attacks hit 2 targets simultaneously</br><@ba.rem>This skill can only be used once per battle</>

The next attack hit twice and deal {%ATK} ATK as Physical Damage each.If enemies killed, DP +{DP}
<@ba.rem>Can store {cnt} charge(s)</>
When skill is activated, ATK +{%ATK}, DEF +{%DEF}, Block +{block_cnt} and attack multiple enemies equal to Block Count
